sentences.sContent: The only catch is, you might get a house gecko infestation next.
sentences.sContent_eng: The only catch is, you might get a house gecko infestation next.
sentences.sCn: 唯一的风险是，接下来你有可能要面对壁虎成灾噢。

sentences.sContent: The only place they didn't check was under the bed, where the gecko was - big as ever, and full at last.
sentences.sContent_eng: The only place they didn't check was under the bed, where the gecko was - big as ever, and full at last.
sentences.sCn: 只有一个地方他们没有检查，那就是床底下，壁虎其实就在那儿——还是那么大，但是终于吃饱了。

sentences.sContent: These compounds may help protect the delicate hairs on the gecko's toes, as the hairs never showed any signs of wear.
sentences.sContent_eng: These compounds may help protect the delicate hairs on the gecko's toes, as the hairs never showed any signs of wear.
sentences.sCn: 这类化合物可能有助于保护壁虎脚趾上的细微毛发，这也印证了这些毛发从来没有磨损的痕迹。
